ygData.subject: Re: Highkeep basement (was What to solo at level 27)
ygData.msgSnippet: The Warrior room has three spawn points, plus can usually grap the 2 hall spawns with ease.  The Raider room has 3 spawn points but spawns much tougher
ygData.messageBody:
The Warrior room has three spawn points, plus can usually grap the 2 hall
spawns with ease. The Raider room has 3 spawn points but spawns much
tougher pickclaws. On some nights if not too many people are in the zone my
group had both room spawns and the hall spawns all to ourselves. It was fast
and furious, non-stop fighting for nearly 2 hours. The smallest group I
have help the raider room with was me, and enchantress, and a ranger, we
broke the spawn up so we had them one at a time and they spawned just as we
were done recovering from the previous fight.

Rokenn



>From: "Reece, Tom - 25IDL G4" <g4mntofcr@...>
>Reply-To: eqbards@onelist.com
>To: eqbards@onelist.com
>Subject: [eqbards] Highkeep basement (was What to solo at level 27)
>Date: Wed, 27 Oct 1999 10:57:00 -1000
>
>I went to the first level of the Highkeep basement for the first time at
>24th
>level. Also went back at 25th level. Due to living in Hawaii and
>generally
>playing late at night, its usually not that crowded when I have been there.
> One
>or two groups at most. Despite this, it seemed there was a very long
>downtime
>in between spawns. I think there are five spawn points on the first level
>where
>pickclaws will appear. Two in the room off to the side. One by the door
>leading to that room. One in a corner further down from the doorway. Last
>one
>on the other side of the room in a corner. There may be more but I know
>there
>are at least five. Even though the pickclaws gave good experience, I was
>bored
>due to all the downtime. Didn't actually time it but I would guess the
>spawn
>rate is around 10 minutes for each spawn point. Is the spawn rate faster
>further down in the basement? Are there more things to fight in the
>basement
>than on the first level?
>
>Thanks
>Galtin of E'ci
>
> > -----Original Message-----
> > From: Rokenn Swiftsong [SMTP:rokenn@...]
> > Sent: Wednesday, October 27, 1999 10:43 AM
> > To: eqbards@onelist.com
> > Subject: Re: [eqbards] What to solo at level 27
> >
> > From: "Rokenn Swiftsong" <rokenn@...>
> >
> > Doh! I relized that right after I sent it, LOL. But the basement is
>still a
> > good spot as I never had to wait more then 30 mins to get into a group
>that
> > would last for the rest of the night. It is a great place for casual
> > grouping, and it is nearly impossible to die there :)
> >
> > Rokenn
> >
> >
> >
>
